sect2.title: What is Results Repository
sect2.para: The Results Repository is a persistent storage of benchmark results and other data obtained when running the benchmarks as well as intermediate data produced when evaluating benchmark tasks' output data.

Results Repository (RR) that comes with this version of BEEN is a successor of the old BEEN's Results Repository. It was designed to fulfill needs for benchmark data persistent storage better than the original version of RR and to do it with more flexibility and generality.

sect2.title: Results Repository Features
sect2.para:
Results Repository features cover the following:
Storing and retrieving data to/from table-like structures (datasets) with custom schema.
Uploading and downloading large binary files to central storage and easily referencing them.
Triggering tasks when new data is added to a dataset, based on trigger condition.
Transaction support for some datasets.
